attributes.action: start a serious national debate about limiting future population growth in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This petition is intended to invite serious, cross-disciplinary and 
pan-governmental debate about one of the last political taboos: population control. I would like to see open and frank consideration of policies and methods of achieving the stabilisation of the UK population in the short term and managed population reduction in the long term.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "start a serious national debate about limiting future population growth in the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17938


Prime Minister's Office
